after_edit.description: Verify code integrity by running all tests after file modifications. Ensures changes don't break existing functionality in the Bazel-managed dotfiles repository.

before_commit.description: Comprehensive pre-commit validation: format all Bazel files according to project standards, then run complete test suite to ensure repository integrity before commits.

always_run.description: Automatically format Bazel files to maintain consistent code style across the dotfiles repository. Runs buildifier on all .bzl, BUILD, and WORKSPACE files.
